boardgame.name: Hardback
boardgame.description: Hardback is a deck-building word game, a prequel to Paperback. As an aspiring 19th-century novelist, you work to pen your next masterpiece, earning prestige along the way. Specialize your deck in certain genres to exploit card combinations, and press your luck to draw extra cards _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; but make sure you can still string a word together!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players build a deck of letters with various powers and race to 60 fame points to win. Some of the features:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; No wilds in your deck - any card can be wild._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Push your luck for more cards with the Ink system._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Match genre colors to gain bonus abilities on your cards._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Fight over the coveted Endorsement cards._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; New Persistent cards stay in play, until someone uses them!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In addition to the competitive race mode for 2-5 players, the base game includes several variant rules, including Literary Awards, Adverts, Player Powers, and Events; and a co-op mode for 1-4 players, in which players join forces against one of four simulated opponents, each of which is proficient in a different deck genre._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: #71: One Deck Dungeon (six-pack review _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; on tap); Mystery of the Temples preview; Hardback _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Pitch Deck
Episode 19 - The DL on the DB with the OP (featuring Hardback, Smile, Council of 4, Otys, Dragonfire, Black Orchestra, and more!)
Episode 30: Islebound, Heaven _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Ale, Dastardly Dirigibles, Hardback, High Treason!
Episode 43 - Playing Campaign Games with Two
Episode 50: London, Azul, Hardback, Raiders of the North Sea, Potion Explosion

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

This game is new and sealed - Kickstarter version. This game has not been played. Due to some unfortunate life events, I am forced to sell my board game collection. For several years I was paid to demo games and afterward, had the option of purchasing the game I demo’d. Because of this, most of my games are either new or have been played once. I have a large number of games for sale, some quite small, so please check my inventory to see if you’d like to purchase multiple items. I will work with you a bit on price if you do, and of course, it will save on shipping. I am an eBay top-rates seller with over 4200 positive feedback. I ship promptly and pack the items well. You will not receive beat-up games with pieces thrown all over inside the box. After purchase, buyer will be responsible for exact shipping charges. I accept PayPal only unless prearranged ahead of time.
Reserved for ADAM
Shrink removed, stickers gingerly applied to the books. Delicately put back into the box. It sits there, on my shelf, unplayed. You need a copy of this game, so you can play it. It calls to you!
Brand new in shrink
Once-played copy in perfect condition. Enjoy!
